mapper.insert: insert into tbl_pa_score(id, name, idCard, phone, imsi, imei, orgName, queryDate, apiQueryDate, returnValue) values(seq_tbl_pa_score.nextval, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone}, #{imsi, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imei, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{queryDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiQueryDate}, #{returnValue})

insert into tbl_pa_score_zh(id, name, idCard, phone, imsi, imei, orgName, queryDate, apiQueryDate, returnValue) values(seq_tbl_pa_score_zh.nextval, #{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCard, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone}, #{imsi}, #{imei}, #{orgName}, #{queryDate}, #{apiQueryDate}, #{returnValue})
